channel.title: File not found *.java?

item.title: File not found *.java?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“chuckjuck, post:14, topic:417956”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=520503.msg3780375#msg3780375 date=1318424804]

oh i remember this happened to me make your your on an admin acc and got to server the file is and just run it normaly

No. You would get an access denied error if it didnt have write permissions for the folder. It cannot find the source files because they’re not in the current directory.

how can i locate the proper directory for the source files and the current location of the source files?

http://ss64.com/nt/cd.html
[/quote]

it looks like the proper directory to me.[/quote]

Then there would be no problem finding the source files…

Read full topic

dylan.hurley:

oh i remember this happened to me make your your on an admin acc and got to server the file is and just run it normaly

No. You would get an access denied error if it didnt have write permissions for the folder. It cannot find the source files because they’re not in the current directory.

item.title: File not found *.java?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“chuckjuck, post:8, topic:417956”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=520503.msg3780354#msg3780354 date=1318421862]

Does your command prompt support the * wildcard? (It should…) And are there any source files in the current working directory?

yes it supports it and i uninstalled jdk and re installed it but it still says the exact same thing.

That was a waste of time, and will never solve a problem… Are their any source files in the working directory? If not youll have to fix that
[/quote]

how do i fix that? i’ve never had this problem with any other compiler v_v[/quote]

Make sure your compiler is looking in the proper directory for the source files?

Read full topic

item.title: File not found *.java?
item.dc:creator: @chuckjuck chuckjuck
item.description:
@chuckjuck wrote:

when i try to compile i get this message;
javac: file not found: *.java
usage: javac

the compiler looks like this;
@echo off
“C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_19/bin/javac.exe” -cp lib.jar; *.java
pause

could someone please help?

Read full topic
